description: Edna Clarke was inspired to volunteer on the Isle of Man by her late husband's military service.
title: New Year Honours 2021: Armed forces charity volunteer awarded BEM
title_page: New Year Honours 2021: Armed forces charity volunteer awarded BEM - BBC News
maintext: She got involved with the armed forces charities as a result of her late husband Ken's service in the Royal Navy during World War Two. The pair were married for 41 years.
